user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my friend's birthday. Can you help me find some funny memes to share on social media? Also, I need a hilarious manatee joke to include in the party invitation. Finally, could you generate a Sponge Bob meme with the text 'Happy Birthday' for the party decorations?

TaskList.description: Search and retrieve funny memes suitable for sharing on social media.
Find a hilarious manatee joke to include in the party invitation.
Generate a Sponge Bob meme with the text 'Happy Birthday' for the party decorations.
